details.instruction:
Build a beautiful, modern web UI dashboard for the autonomy system with:
- Sleek dark theme with gradient accents (purple, blue, cyan)
- Glassmorphism cards with blur effects  
- Animated transitions and hover effects
- Real-time charts showing token usage and task completion
- Task Kanban board (todo, in-progress, done columns)
- Better typography with modern fonts
- Responsive grid layout
- Status indicators with pulse animations
- Command palette for quick actions
- Much better than the current basic HTML

details.name: task-1771961065
details.verification: Built beautiful web UI with correct logo colors (red #e94560 accent, dark #1a1a2e theme), glassmorphism cards, task complete/delete buttons, info bar showing system status, and proper task display. Tested at http://localhost:8767 - both tasks showing correctly.

details.task: Run autonomy improvement cycle - check for enhancements, update web UI, add new features
Analyze current web UI and suggest 5 specific improvements with implementation plan
Research best practices for autonomous agent systems and identify missing features in our implementation
Review the autonomy CLI and identify UX improvements that would make it more intuitive

details.instruction: Build real-time charts for token usage and task completion in web UI dashboard. Add dark/light mode toggle, task search/filter, and export to CSV/JSON functionality. Make it production-ready with responsive design.

details.name: task-1771965901
details.verification: Enhanced web UI with Chart.js real-time charts showing task status, dark/light mode toggle with localStorage persistence, task search and filter functionality, export to JSON/CSV buttons, and fully responsive design. All features tested and working at http://localhost:8767
